items.question: What should employees wear?
items.answer: Match your company culture - business casual for most tech companies, or whatever reflects your team's vibe. Consistency matters more than formality.

items.question: How do we handle remote employees?
items.answer: Just send them an invite link. They can submit their selfie from anywhere in the world.

items.question: Can we integrate with our HRIS?
items.answer: Yes. We offer integrations with major HR systems to automate the onboarding flow.

items.question: What about employees who already have headshots?
items.answer: No problem. You can regenerate with our system for consistency, or keep their existing photos.

items.question: Do you offer startup pricing?
